first.question:
You arrive at the movie theater and want to go watch a new movie alone. You don't have a ticket yet. 
What do you do first?
answers: You go to buy a ticket and treats
You go to the bathroom
You stand still

liput.question: You arrive at the checkout and put a ticket and treats you are about to buy on the counter.
answers: You tell at which movie you’re going to go watch and say you want to buy a ticket
You just give the seller treats, you don’t say anything and you go later to buy the ticket separately
You make sure there is someone in front of you so you can see how to act

vessa.question: You come out of the bathroom and notice a traffic jam in the movie theater.
answers: You go to buy treats and tickets
You leave the theater

paikka.question: You stand still and you don’t know what to do.
answers: You ask the theater staff what you should do
You leave the theater

lahteminen.question: You leave the theater and go back home.
answers: You send a complaint to the theater for no reason
You go home
Lähetät teatterille realistisen palautteen

odottaa.question: You have purchased a ticket and you notice a free seat outside the hall.
answers: You go to sit in that place
You stay standing

saliin.question: People are allowed to enter the hall.
answers: You go to the queue
You wait for the queue to finish and then you go to the hall
You stand still and don’t go to the hall

tilanne.question: A person in poor condition comes to wait to enter the hall, but is not able to sit anywhere.
answers: You offer your own place
You do nothing
You tell someone else to give their place

jalkeen.question: The movie is over.
answers: You put your own trash in the trash can, go to the bathroom and leave the theater
You put your own trash in the trash can and go home
You leave your trash, go to the bathroom and leave the theater
You leave your trash and go home
